title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you download, create and run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and 30+ other models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; install with pip install ollama and chat with local models in two lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain as a standard LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; no API keys, runs entirely in browser against your local server.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds persistent chat history, syntax highlighting and markdown rendering on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot with autocomplete and explain-code actions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 40+ recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, RAG, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-nvidia-toolkit
summary: NVIDIA reference toolkit that adds TensorRT-LLM and vLLM backends to Ollama for 2-3x faster inference on RTX/Ada GPUs.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Unofficial registry browser that scrapes the Ollama library and lets you filter 200+ GGUF models by size, quant, family, license.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, Redis, Postgres, nginx, and automatic HTTPS via Let’s Encrypt.

title: ollama-helm-chart
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity, autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag-qa-streamlit
summary: Streamlit app that implements retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions with any Ollama model, supports slash-commands, message history and admin whitelisting.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode that threads replies and lets teams pick different models per channel.

title: ollama-function-calling
summary: Experimental patch that adds OpenAI-style function-calling to any GGUF model running in Ollama via guided-json generation.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Async Rust SDK with tokio, serde and native TLS; published as crate ollama-rs on crates.io.
